entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
